value:
Huh? So you're saying I've been
recruited into the..."Order of Heroes"?$k$pNo offense, but orders and heroes...
Ain't really my thing.

I was kicking around Novis Greatport,
selling my sword, scraping by... Then
that strange lass hired me.

You've got another job? Ya know,
working yourself to the bone never
helped anyone.$k$pOnce you're back, I'll show you how to
unwind for a change.

Psst. Hey... Got any tips on where a
fella can go for a good time? Slip me
the info, will ya?

I was just cleaning my sword. It's how
I earn a living, after all. Thing's a real
beaut, don't you think?

I've greetings for ya from
$Nf.$k$pHey, this place ain't half bad. Might
have myself a look around before I
head back...
Heh. Not bad, if I say so myself.
Am I sharp today, or what?
That...was unexpected.

I'll pay you back by putting this
skill to work.

The name's Saber. I'm a mercenary.
And as long as you're paying,
I'm fighting.

Nice timing,
$Nu.$k$pI was about to head into town for
some fun, if you want to tag along.$k$pToo busy, you say? There's more to
life than work, you know. You never
know which day could be your last.$k$pSo I say eat, drink, and be merry if
you can! OK, OK! Uncross your arms
and take that frown off your face.$k$pUgh, the toughest mercenary you
ever met, trounced by a look...
My reputation is ruined.$k$pAhh, no hard feelings. We're cool
now, so it's fine. But let's hang
out sometime soon, yeah?
せやあっ
おらよっ
Hey, that HURT!
うわあああーっ！！
You don't know when to quit!
Move!
You can't win!
Get a load of this!
Botched it.
Haha
Whoa, hey now. Messin' with me?
Hmm. Think twice before gettin' on my bad side.
Long as this stays lively, I don't give a damn about the details.
Lookin' for a good time here! C'mon! ...Anyone? Hello?
Piece of advice. Dealin' with a fancy lass is always a bad idea.
Everyone has a past. Remember that.
You ain't half-bad. Ha! Not half-good either.
All right.
Huh...
On it.
